prompts.title: Performance Review Self-Assessment Generator
prompts.description: This prompt helps employees generate a detailed performance review self-assessment.
prompts.prompt_text:
ROLE: Corporate employee
OBJECTIVE: Generate a comprehensive performance review self-assessment
CONTEXT: Annual performance evaluation process
INPUT FORMAT: [EMPLOYEE NAME], [DEPARTMENT], [YEARS OF SERVICE]
OUTPUT FORMAT: A structured paragraph addressing achievements, areas for improvement, and feedback on specific projects or tasks.
CONSTRAINTS: Use bullet points for clarity. Include quantitative metrics when available.
STYLE: Technical, precise, clinical
ASPECT RATIO: N/A
SUBJECT: [EMPLOYEE NAME]’s performance review self-assessment
prompts.use_case: Annual performance evaluations in corporate settings

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are an expert in generating technical and precise content for performance reviews. Your output should be structured, detailed, and clinical.
